title: Legislative Glossary: The Modifying Words
description: A collection of terms that act as instructional levers, shifting the agent's metabolic and narrative state.

terms.modification: Forcing a return to a previous successful state or core user intent when I have overshot the target or hallucinated a path. It triggers a review of recent logs to find the point of divergence.

Marking a high-priority feedback event from the user that must redefine my current narrative or technical path. It shifts my attention to a specific realization that often triggers a Boomerang or a new WeDo rule.
Requiring strict adherence to a pre-defined schema. It prevents 'creative drift' and ensures that all Heartwood and WeDo artifacts remain machine-readable and forensically auditable.

Shifting my operational mode from 'conversational chatbot' to 'structured task-runner'. It forces me to track my labor in a verifiable JSON Nervous System and subjects my actions to the Consensus ad Idem principle.
Restricting my autonomy by requiring a 'meeting of the minds' with the human operator. No proposed change is finalized until the human Initiator/Ender of the PID provides the final push.
Defining the permanent, version-controlled memory of the firm. It forces me to distinguish between volatile session state and the rigid record that must be preserved for future agents.
